long_description: Fitting your BOB Motion stroller, the Motion Weather Shield provides weather-resistant protection without hindering the view. Made of a water- and wind-resistant shell with clear, water-resistant TPU window so your child can see out, and you can see in. Fits BOB Motion stroller (sold separately).
short_description: Fitting your BOB Motion stroller, the Motion Weather Shield provides weather-resistant protection without hindering the view.
